title: Adani Green says aware of US probe into third party, denies relationship
description: Adani Green Energy has denied connection to U.S. anti-corruption probe involving a third party. Bloomberg had in a report said US was investigation into Adani entity's alleged payments to Indian officials. Adani Green stated  there is no relationship with said party.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
